name: Pitch Perfect Ear Training
description: A quiz game that tests how pitch perfect your ears are! Review notes/pitches, intervals, chords and scales. You can also try to guess the key of a musical piece created using a proprietary custom music writing algorithm. Fresh music to keep your ears fresh!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/8/10 Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 700 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound
